channel.title: Friendster on Writing by Harper Reed
channel.description: Recent content in Friendster on Writing by Harper Reed

item.title: friendster rules..
item.description: so I have recently been getting more and more random messages from people on friendster. This one really caught my eye. well it caught it by calling me an asshole… it rules. I was so surprised. at first I was honestly concerned.. but then.. I thought about it. and whatever.. hehe I rule. How could you have all those friends?? You are such an asshole! I remember you in Chi-town and you were so fucking rude!

item.title: looter
item.description: woah. that is craziness. today at work I won tickets to go and see swat. with colin farrell. I am kinda excited. I hate to admit it. but whatever.why does friendster suck so bad lately.. how can I cruise for friends.. when the pictures don’t work. stupid pictures…

item.title: woah
item.description: here is a picture from the other night.. heheh..
